name: Untamed
description:
Untamed is a 2D creative sandbox game...

Untamed is a 2D take on the game Minecraft, bringing the block building scenario to the 2nd dimension. There is a wide range of textures to build from and truly anything is possible

Features:

  • 2 Dimensional Creative Block Building
  • Variety of textures
  • Maximum options for performance
  • Constant developer updates
  • Modding support

Recommended Specifications - Intel or AMD Equivalent Processor @ 2.0Ghz - Integrated graphics card for a minimum of 30FPS
